div.div:
D-Man - March 11, 2012 - LG Optimus One with version 1.3.3.56
Great for great phones
I love everything about this. Really helps customize my phone to make it really look the way I want, and make my iPhone friends jealous! However, I have a lower-end device and this will often crash. Still worth it to me though.

Arlo - March 27, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Best so far!
Best launcher.. I've tried all the popular ones.. taking my cue from droid forums and tech magazines. ADW Ex was not the top choice but i found out otherwise. The best choice for all you mods and customization freaks just like me ha ha.

linesma - December 14, 2011 - Version 1.3.3.56
Love it!
I have been using ADW.Launcher now for almost a year on my old tablet. When I bought my new tablet, Toshiba AT100 (Thrive in the US), I bought the EX version, and I am kicking myself for not purchasing it earlier. The expanded customization options have allowed me to truly make this tablet my own. I strongly recommend this app.

Alex - December 16, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Regarding update:
Update has brought some good new features, but why get rid of the old hidden dock bar?? One of my favourite features on ADW. Please fix.

Matt - January 13, 2012 - Samsung Admire with version 1.3.3.56
The best
It's the only home replacement app that's not super laggy on 2.3 Android I figured every replacement would run smother on it but some of them work better on 2.1 that's just weird adw has the best themes anyways so I don't mind at all. I've always liked adw launcher anyway

Steve - January 4, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Awesome!
Works a treat on my low spec galaxy phone and out performs the other launchers by a long shot - top notch app.

Jessica - February 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Fantastic Launcher
This launcher has Launcher Pro beat! Tried them both and love this one. So much easier to use and works perfectly! Thanks devs.... Samsung Galaxy 2

Gosa - January 12, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.3.3.56
Excellent replacement for HTC Sense
Sense in HTC Inspire was a pure crap. Used to crash at least twice a day, requiring a battery pull. ADW has been awesome, out of my way, very fast, makes you forget it is there and gives a better battery life.

Imhotep - December 14, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 1.3.3.56
:)!
Fantastic, but... All this needs is the ability to hide apps in the app drawer :), AND I DONT THINK THE OPENING TRADITIONS WORK (no meanness intended)

X - April 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Tried them all. Keep coming back.
This launcher is the most stable, smooth and customisable one out there (Doesn't require internet access permissions like most, no privacy leaks). I just wish the dev would continue to refine this already adequate app. It's a shame to neglect an app best in it's category! ):

Chris - January 2, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Never failed me so far.
Fully customizable, light on resources, works perfectly on Huawei Ideos (U8150) and Ideos X5 (U8800).

Cormac - March 31, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Tablet
Although it is much faster than the stock honeycomb launcher, it doesn't switch orientation as tidily. Eg I can't get some widgets into their correct size no matter what grid configuration I use. Would give 5 stars for better 16:9 screen support.

Shane - February 1, 2012 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 1.3.3.56
Dare I say, better than Go?
I've used Go Launcher for quite some time now. It's got lots of features and is highly customizable, but lately it has become sluggish. So I decided to give ADW another shot. Wow! I am very impressed with it's speed. Plus it has a graft deal of customizability as well. I'll stick with ADW from now on. Good job, dev.

synaesthetic - February 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.3.56
New update works well on ICS, but...
Great stuff, after the most recent update almost everything is working flawlessly! However, on my new Galaxy Nexus, the dock bar occasionally goes dead/less sensitive and I have to restart the launcher to avoid mashing the buttons several times. This doesn't happen on the stock ICS launcher or any modified versions of the stock launcher.

Rob - December 12, 2011 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 1.3.3.56
Excellent
I'm not sure I could be happier, especially since I got it during the 10 cent deals. So much better than the default launcher on Asus Transformer. Organization is very helpful and animations are slick. Nice job Anderweb!

jiko - February 23, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Awesome
New folders great,5 star from me again. Those saying you cant edit in dock no more,try reading changelog! double tap.

Terry - December 22, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.3.3.56
Excellent update, working flawlessly.
Runs very smooth with Ice Cream Sandwich roms - ZERO lag or redraws here. Love the new config options. Nexus S 4G, ICS 4.0.3 rom

Bruce - December 23, 2011 - Version 1.3.3.56
Landscape for Gingerbread blows!
I really like this. I just don't understand why the dock will only sit at the bottom of the screen in landscape mode for Honeycomb and up.. Why not for Gingerbread? There REALLY should be a setting in there so we can choose. I don't think Honeycomb or ICS users can choose to NOT have it at the bottom of the screen.. I would be interested in knowing if this problem is due to some type of OS constraint, hardware issue or just a bad decision... As it is I lose dock icons in landscape. 5 stars if it's fixed.

March 18, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.3.3.56
Finaly a launcher pro rival!
Wow! Have been a launcher pro user for some time now and have tried countless other launchers ...but this once i got the theme i wanted have been able to customize to my hearts content! Have been able to make it near perfect ,it works very smoothly and quickly ...only problem is the play shop widget doesnt seem to come out right, as in it looks like its missing parts of its picture but tbh i dont think its the app and more the widget itself lol ..overall v impressed by this launcher !!! Motorola atrix ...

A - May 31, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
The Good and Not So Good
I've been using GoLauncher EX for a long time. Switched recently to ADW EX and here are my thoughts: Speed, transition effects, customizations: ADW EX wins hands down, more options, smoother animations and great dock customization. F/Cs: I had no issues with F/Cs using either launcher on my old Samsung Galaxy and on my new Droid. App Drawer: Gotta give it to GoLauncher EX here. The ability to add folders to the app drawer does NOT exist in ADW. Also, with GoLauncher you can sort apps by All/Recent/Running. Sorting by runnign allows you to terminate apps that are sucking resources, and sorting by Recent allows you to clean history of recently used apps. <THIS FEATURE IS SORELY MISSED! It would be great if ADW would add this. Themes: Both launchers offer some really great themes. I prefer ADW simply because of the extra icons available with many of the themes. Overall a GREAT launcher, I'm very happy!

Justin - May 12, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Sensation 4g
Love this app but drains my battery to quickly, i hardly use my phone and drains to quick please fix removing intil then my battery doesnt last 3 hrs with out going in yellow this is me not using the phone, also since downloading it my brightness setting has been changing to full brightness by itself

Chad - April 20, 2012 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Amazing
This is pretty cool. I was worried about switching back to stock (no option) but if you are rooted, just "freeze it" in Titanium Backup, and wala, you have your stock back and can defrost it to switch back and forth. Great app, well worth the money!

furo - January 7, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
random restarts
I'm experiencing random restarts of my device (Huawei MediaPad) when using ADWLauncher EX, it's happening mostly when the device is going to sleep, when I try to wake it up, I realize it's turned off.. sometimes there's "enter PIN" screen which indicates self-restart.. I purchased it 24 hours ago and I experienced more than 10 self-restarts of my device.. if the ADW launcher is installed, but not running, everything is fine.. I wrote an email to the developer, let's see this issue can be resolved oh, I was hoping to hold on Rating until this issue is resolved, but I can't write a review without the rating.. and I just realized the review on the bottom of this page by Jimmy on December 13, 2011, who's experiencing the same restarts with his device.. that's very dissapointing.. I'm rating with 3 stars than and I'll come back later with new rating depends on the reaction and possible solution from developer

Barbra - January 26, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 1.3.3.56
WOW!
I don't know what to say, there are so many customizations I could get lost. This is my first customizable launcher so I'm still learning, but so far I love it. Added bonus, when I bought this launcher I didn't realize I would be able to download TONS of other themes and icon packs for FREE. It is so worth the few bucks I paid to be able to use this on my Galaxy S, Asus Transformer and Lenovo IdeaPad K1.

Scott - January 25, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Perfection
One of the best and most polished apps I use, always one of the first apps I download SGS2

Sam - March 1, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.3.56
Excellent!
Takes time to setup properly but absolutely worth it! I decided to try ADW after (getting the impression - I might be wrong) that GO Launcher did not support my existing widgets. The free version (of ADW) was not working for me so I tried the paid version in the hope that it might get more attention from the developer. It certainly does. It has a couple of minor bugs but is otherwise a massive improvement over the default ICS Launcher. Thanks!

none - January 16, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Needs an upgrade
But not great. As adw has grown they've taken a few features out, and put a lot more in, which were sometimes confusing to get to. Requires lots of patience

Tom - December 18, 2011 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Disappointed.
I would of gave it 5 stars if the froyo dock, icons and dots were included in this like the screenshots show. Huge disappointment.

liran vaknin - December 12, 2011 - Version 1.3.3.56
Amazingly fast!
This is the fastest launcher I've seen so far! The only thing that needs to be added is the option to make folders inside the app drawer.

Tyler - March 28, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
More Updates
This is the best launcher by far. The customization is amazing and always runs smooth and never force closes. Thr only thing that adw needs to do is update it more, it feels like they abondoned it because we havnt had an uldate in forever

Mark - April 11, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Nice,
It is s nice launcher, very customizable, it would be perfect except for two things. One. Lack of support (I have scanned the site and emailed dev w/o responses ...ever..so if something doesn't work..you're on your own). Two the dev's own launcher add-on to display # of unread emails or SMS doesn't work with ADW EX.very strange since it works with default touch wis launcher :-(

G.Amin - December 20, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Best app I paid for
I have an HTC sensation with sense installed, I grew tired of the home loading screen. ( Google HTC sense loading screen) so I bought this. My phone feels ten times faster. The filler organization blew me away. Why can't the big companies learn from this developer. I would give ten stars If I could. Great job . I don't want to root and this app makes me happy about my phone.

Akhil - December 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Not so good.
The default TouchWiz of SGS2 is far smoother than this. Moreover the free GoLauncher is better than this. Need a lot of improvement.

Jonathan - December 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Awesome app - needs some updating
Great launcher. Would be even better if you could have folders within the app drawer. Gets hard to find things when u have 100+ apps and widgets.

colin - December 28, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.3.56
Superior launcher
I have tried many many launchers and this is really the best in terms of usability and prompt updates. Please fix the notifier as it FC in GNex. Thanks much!

Alan - December 27, 2011 - Version 1.3.3.56
Fast, smooth
Fast, smooth, and featureful on all my high and low-end devices. Worth the full price. Galaxy S CM7 and Huawei U8150 CM7.

Alon - December 16, 2011 - Version 1.3.3.56
Great but...
it's great app . everything works perfect expect one thing.. i cannot create folders in the drawer.. and that's why i left this app i have hundrends of apps.. and if i don't organize it in the darwer it's impossible to find anything.. hopefully it will be creared.. :\

Zen - January 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Good app, poor support.
I liked the free version enough to purchase this one at full price, and I do enjoy the enhancements, but there are features in the free version that are not in this one. When I emailed the developer to inquire, I never received a response. Disappointed.

Michael - December 29, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.3.3.56
Still decent, but...
This app is still alright, but it's come downhill with the recent updates. The dev has removed features and at the same time caused some performance hits (apps launched from the dock take much longer than those launched from the home screen). Definitely needs some tweaks.

Mikhail - June 12, 2012 - Acer Picasso with version 1.3.3.56
Great app but...
Can you please update the dock to a more CM7 looking and functioning dock? The dock is really hideous and if the top indicating bar were ICS that would be excellent. There's a bug with the wallpaper that inhibits it to work as stock launcher displays it. The primer reason picking this launcher is that you can use the hide label to make it look Clean so having the edit option and the wall paper chooser on the desktop instead of within the drawer is not up to date. Also it would be nice to have access to widgets from within the drawer.

Sean - February 27, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 1.3.3.56
Does ICS spell the end of ADWex?
I have been a loyal user for some time, however I tried the newly released ICS update from Asus for my transformer. Whilst the build is buggy and I'm back to HC 3.2.1, I did like the way ICS integrates the apps drawer with the widgets view. Any plans to update ADWex to include or improve upon the new ICS launcher? I love the dock function of ADWex, but it will become a tougher choice between it and stoked ICS when faster, less buggy builds turn up in coming weeks. Hoping you plan to move ADWex into the world of ICS, and up the features! Thanks.

Lee - December 12, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.3.3.56
My favorite launcher
Of all the launcher replacements this is the best! And improvements are always coming! Learn the settings and you will have complete control.

Mark - December 17, 2011 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 1.3.3.56
More than expected
Bought this app during 10¢ sale. Very much satisfied with this. Menus/options are simple to go through. A reset option to go back to default makes it feel safer to mess around with options. My Samsung Charge even seems to scroll and work much smoother when going from screen to screen even with added transitions. Worth the buy.

berry - January 31, 2012 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 1.3.3.56
The best thing to hit my tablet screen.
For the price i payed for this quality piece of software, i almost feel guilty. Really good launcher an works great of galaxy 10.1.

William - March 13, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.3.56
Once a great app, now abandoned.
Loved ADW when it first came out, but due to lack of continuing support from AnderWeb made me move onto apex launcher. Need better ICS compatibility.

Erin - January 19, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Most Versatile!
Offers THE MOST options of all the home launcher apps. Just wish it offered option of vertical dock in portrait mode and horizontal in landscape. Some 3D paneling would be awesome.

Jasmine - January 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Great
Love it, except the wallpaper zoom? When I set an image from my gallery it doesn't display right, fix please

Zakery - May 23, 2012 - Casio G'zOne Commando with version 1.3.3.56
Amazing!
I got this application when it first came out, and it's come a long way since it first came out. The stock G'zone Commando UI just blows, but this launcher makes my Commando a phone worth having. Well done!

TheWizKid95 - March 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.3.56
5 stars!
Everything fine, but I'd like for the homescreen layout on xhdpi devices like the Galaxy Nexus fixed. When using a widget like Minimalistic Text that uses large widgets, the widget does not take up the whole screen unless the dock is enabled.

Julie - December 12, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.3.3.56
Love the App
Been using the free version 4ever!!! Just upgraded, love it but I miss some of the options in the free version. :-( Will email the options I'm missing

Ferdi - March 12, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Where is the app hide in drawer?
Love this but why is it missing the ability to hide non used apps in the app drawer ? Edit: I just learned about app catalogs ...this is a better way of isolating apps...thanks

Ian - December 21, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.3.56
Good but little things get irritating
Scrolling widgets are choppy and when I leave an app like youtube or the browser it seems to reload all the icons and widgets. Can this be fixed. Galaxy Nexus.

Yo - December 27, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.3.3.56
Good app, but...
No Dev Response. Great app, but has its hitches and bugs. Redraws constantly. No response from devs after multiple emails = lost stars. Poor customer support never flies with me.

simon - April 5, 2012 - SEMC Xperia Neo V with version 1.3.3.56
Omg
You know what I have had adw launcher since day dot.. Brought it when android first come out and forgot all about it and also used it while using CM and been looking for a fast launcher and tired all the rest and remember got this one... I forgot how fast and smooth..

Jonathan - January 8, 2012 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 1.3.3.56
Dock is not totally hosed.
With Launcher Pro+ I can scroll the bottem dock in both directions. This home I can only scroll to the left. As another reviewer pointed out it stupidly tries to reposition icons when one is added or removed. We need to scroll in both directions, set the number of dock icons, and not have it try and auto arrange them when adding or removing icons. Homescreen also lags now.

Alex - March 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.3.56
Ics issue
When using hd quality wallpaper, screen turns all black and need to restart adw and picture appears. Does not happen with nova launcher. Any fix? Otherwise the best

Ben - February 23, 2012 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Fluid and Responsive.
This is by far the smoothest interface I have ever used. I was using GO launcher. It was very customizable but slowed speeds down a bit. Most recently it has resulted in major bugs and lag. Made the the switch to ADW.

Michael - February 1, 2012 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Simply the best
I can honestly say that this launcher goes on every new phone I purchase with the ice cream sandwich theme! It makes my phone look amazing and is highly worth the money. Thank you adw ex devs for making me love every android phone I own.

John - February 13, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.3.3.56
Fantastic
There are tons of customization options. Highly recommend. Will load options a bit slow if running on older phone like original DROID. Runs very smooth on DROID RAZR.

Diego - March 22, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 1.3.3.56
Now my tablet looks unique!
Awesome! Now I feel like my tablet reflects my personality. It looks so much cleaner than the stock theme that came with my Asus eee Tab. Only thing is that when changing orientation its a bit slower but no big deal since I mostly use it Horizontally and have no reason to flip to the side.

anwar - December 12, 2011 - Version 1.3.3.56
great app
not sure why, but while using adw launcher, i always got ~10mb free memory than using stock Xperia homescreen. I'm happy so far with this transition

Orang - March 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.3.3.56
Bad performance on Galaxy Note
Have been using this launcher for more than a year, but after getting my Note it became laggy. I even see graphical glitches on desktop scrolling (cube inverse effect). Definitely a software problem on the resources Note has. Until fixed, 1 star.

bageese - April 1, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF201 with version 1.3.3.56
Transformer Prime
I've never been the biggest fan of ADW Launcher, but decided to give it a second go with my new tablet, because the Hubs UI was very intriguing. In trying to emulate ICS the dev took things that I didn't like about ICS and applied to his latest update (lack of screen real estate on sides). If he was going to take something from ICS I would have liked the better app drawer and widget browser. He's still in Gingerbread mode when it comes to these features. I'm having to hunt for an older version of ADW to get my screen real estate back. There are going to need to be massive improvements before I consider using it on my HTC Desire Z.

Michael - March 29, 2012 - LG Optimus One with version 1.3.3.56
Great App
Great App and worth the price, easy to use and set up, Using it on CM7 and my phone seems to be more responsive.

D - December 24, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.3.3.56
Not good
Never have I experienced problems before...TIL THE LAST COUPLE UPDATES..adw was better than Go launcher, Regina,Zeam, Nemus, now going back to stock launcher Plse...fix new dock option to take off the unlimited icon on dock....hopefully Xmas comes soon.

February 4, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Best of both worlds
Speed and lightness of Launcher Pro with customizability of Go Launcher. Does not eat as much memory as Go Launcher ex. A little buggy on my xperia pro with gingerbread though. Sometimes the desktop will slow to a crawl and i'll have to restart to fix it. Thats why I gave it four stars.

Nine - January 31, 2012 - Motorola Defy with version 1.3.3.56
Poorly featured...
When compared to its free (and far more polished) version. Interface looks very messy when editing screens: grids and icons bounce all over the place. I expected far more customisation. Avoid.

Asher - December 12, 2011 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Superb launcher...
Use on my Photon and IconiaTab. New updates make this far and away the best launcher for tablets. Great work!

Paul - April 7, 2012 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 1.3.3.56
Great Launcher
I'm new to the whole android thing...and this Launcher brought me the slick cool UI I was looking for :)

Taylor - December 20, 2011 - HTC Incredible S with version 1.3.3.56
I love it. It's so customizable and user friendly. I miss my sense widgets. ...
I love it. It's so customizable and user friendly. I miss my sense widgets. However, all the benefits of adw outweigh the loss of those widgets.

Thomas - January 29, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Really great, but...
I love this and all the customisations you can do. A minor but annoying issue is that when you have landscape format the wallpaper is centred on the top of the wallpaper, (the cross of a T) not in the middle (the middle of a +). This means that a lot of custom wallpapers look a bit odd. Otherwise I love the customisations possible and the ability to theme and change the icons and descriptions.

Asoul - February 1, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.3.3.56
Best launcher.
Is by far the best launcher on the Market....nuff said... Galaxy Nexus..

TanookiTravis - February 8, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.3.3.56
Excellent foldering/options
O love the way folders work/look on this launcher and there are a ton of great options to customize and make it look just like ICS.

john ater - December 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Tab with version 1.3.3.56
Almost perfect!
I never say that but after months of the Samsung 7" tab launcher, ADW won my heart. For a great machine, Samsung employes a crappy launcher.

Francis - March 13, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Installed on my Lenovo A1-7 tablet
Despite a few minor issues, I feel that the ADW launcher has enabled me to configure my tablet to suit my own personal needs. Please continue to improve this excellent app as its the best launcher I have found so far.

Grace - December 30, 2011 - Version 1.3.3.56
Bad
Slows lg esteem, no.reply from emails support, i creted folders that worked, then went bad and hid behind dock for no reason. Not worth the lag. Uninstall.

Srikanth - December 14, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Fit with version 1.3.3.56
Galaxy fit
Very good Anyone knows how to get those buttons in the fourth picture.......airplane mode, wifi and all of that......better than go launcher ex.

Destroyer of Worlds - March 15, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Cool launcher, total resource hog
I didn't have this problem with the version of ADW bundled with cyanogenmod. If the battery drain issue gets fixed this is an easy five stars. Please fix it!

noname - February 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.3.3.56
Freezes
Works great when it works, but is annoying since it keeps freezing up (ANR) causing a FC.

Kiko - December 20, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.3.3.56
What happen to 2nd dock bar?
Last update eliminated my second dock bar!!! I know I can use swiping sides, but the other was better for system setups. Examples wifi, 3g, Bluetooth.

Anis - May 20, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Used to be great :/
This launcher was the best. So good that it became the default launcher in CyanogenMod7. Now launchers like Nova and Apex are controlling the 4.0/ICS scene. Try those launcher before using this one if you're running 4.0+. I hope that anderwebs finds some time to update this bad boy to blow nova and apex out the water.

Bhavin - January 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Great launcher BUT
Please provide a confirmation dialogue before creating a folder. It is a much needed feature to prevent accidental folder creation.

Joe - January 31, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.3.3.56
Worth the price... More than, really.
I payed 10¢ for it, and I feel bad for not paying full price for it. Runs well, is very smooth, and I love it. Motorola ATRIX 4G

joshua - December 22, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.3.3.56
Thunderbolt users
Descent update mess this great app up? Try uninstalling and reinstalling seems to be working for me good now.

Jason - March 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.3.3.56
Good..
Have used for a long time with Android 2.3. Its not so smooth with ICS though. Have now moved to Apex which is very similar but faster & smoother.

Brandon - April 22, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.3.3.56
The best ICS experience.
This launcher gets me closer to TRUE ICS than any other home replacement. Everything is smooth and cool. There is only one problem I have-not when the system closes it/redraws. Which I can normally fix with fast reboot. But other than that, it's perfect!

thomas - May 2, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Good launcher
Pretty good launcher, but there are better for free, see Go launcher. Needs better transitions and a lower price to compete.

Jaime - December 12, 2011 - Version 1.3.3.56
Wow
Best launcher i've tried so far, really smooth and many cool and useful features. keep it up!

Brad - June 12, 2012 - Version 1.3.3.56
Fast, adds functionality
Doesn't bog down devices at all, love dock on droidx (CM7) and xoom (CM9). Only thing I would love to see added - functionality like the app Multicon, but making it so it isn't a widget (or even if it is) so when you backup with titanium, the screen is restored correctly instead of losing the widget.

-DED- - December 26, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.3.3.56
Great!
More options and tweaks please! Perhaps Catalog labels and smoother Catalog swipe in the 4D drawer. And the ability to make 1 dock icon larger than the others. :-)

J.B. - December 25, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.3.3.56
Works great, unless....
There is a bug that occurs if you use the drawer option "Horizontal Paginated" while having a large amount of apps installed. The last few pages are messed up and either link to the wrong app or are dead links. 5/5 if that gets fixed.

Sam - January 23, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.3.3.56
Luv it
Works great on my rooted inspire 4g. Running cm7. I've tried all launchers and this is by far one of the best. Only feature id love to see is a scrolling dock.

Justin - December 30, 2011 - Version 1.3.3.56
The best!
I was stuck with a bland 3 icon dock with SprintID as my third icon, which didn't change even after I uninstalled SprintID. Afterwards the button did nothing. Theb came ADW to save the day, giving me a flashy, resource sipping, ultra-customizable bucket of goodnesss. This is how apps ought to be on the Android market and a shininh example of what other programers should strive for. Keep up the good work!

Christopher - December 12, 2011 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.3.3.56
